discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
Part of tuning correlation searches for a new Splunk Enterprise Security (ES) installation includes configuring correlation adaptive responses. Adaptive responses are actions that are automatically or manually triggered based on the results of correlation searches. Properly configuring these responses helps ensure that the correlation searches effectively support incident response workflows.

Selected Answer: B
The correct answer is B
B. Configuring correlation adaptive responses.

Selected Answer: B
The correct answer is B

Selected Answer: B
P: 199 "Tuning Correlation Searches"

The answer is B - Splunk ES Admin Slides 230

questions.question_text: Which of the following are the default ports that must be configured for Splunk Enterprise Security to function?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: A
For sure!

Selected Answer: A
Splunk Web default port is 8000

questions.question_text: What is the main purpose of the Dashboard Requirements Matrix document?

choices.D: Identifies which data model(s) depend on each dashboard.
choices.C: Identifies the searches used by the dashboards.
choices.A: Identifies on which data model(s) each dashboard depends.
choices.B: Provides instructions for customizing each dashboard for local data models.

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: A
The main purpose of the Dashboard Requirements Matrix document is to identify which data models each dashboard depends on. This helps ensure that the necessary data is available and properly modeled to support the functionality of the dashboards in Splunk Enterprise Security.

Selected Answer: A
A. Identifies on which data model(s) each dashboard depends.

Selected Answer: A
The correct answer is A

Selected Answer: A
P: 160 "Confirming Normalization"
A is Correct
answer is A
